Text: After a week of careful preparation the colony is ready to begin the long trek to Big Spring. 3 vehicles make up the convoy: A school bus. A roadster and a gasolene tanker. In this fuel-starved world gasolene is the most valuable of all commodities. If the city gangs were to discover we are transporting such a load they would try to capture it. On the day Long Jake Bannerman will drive north in search for weapons and ammunition. His brother owned a store in (Sherman) and kept his stock of guns in the basement. Jake  sets out for (Sherman) in his truck.  Two hours later he radios a message from (Sherman). He has found rifles and ammunition but his truck has broken down. He has also found a survivor'a teenage girl' and he requests that you come to pick them up as soon as possible. Uncle Jonas agrees tells him to sit tight and wait for you to arrive. You slide behind the wheel of your roadster and fire up then with a farewell you power the car out of McKinney and speed northwards to (Sherman).
Turn to North.

As you reach  (Sherman) you are ambushed by an armed gang forcing you to jump out of your car one member of the gang is using a building to shoot from. You have no choice but to draw your gun an fire back. Your bullet strikes him in the chest spinning him away from the window. Your single shot proved fatal. Remember to erase one 9mm round from your'Ammo Pouch.

You are forced to break cover as gunfire erupts from all sides. You zigzag towards the door but your manoeuvre is anticipated and a stream of bullets tears up the ground. Gritting your teeth against the sudden pain of your wound you force yourself forwards and fall headlong through the doorway.

Another burst of fire echoes from across the street and once more Long Jake shouts for you to take cover. With your pulse racing you jump to your feet and sprint head down towards the darkened doorway.  Pick a number from the'Random Number Table'and add to it your current Stealth skill total.
If the total is now 5 or less'turn to North // A bullet hits you as you run for cover
If it is 6 or more'turn to East // You evade taking any damage and escape the hale of bullets sent your way.

With practised ease you cup your pistol in both hands thumb back the safety catch and take aim at the shadow that fills half the window frame. If the total is now 0'7'turn to North // You have taken yet another hit and miss your target running into a small room after the pain sets in. \\

You run for your car and vault over the trunk landing feet-first in the driving seat your hand poised to switch on the ignition. The engine growls but before you can shift gears and speed away a leather-clad punk come running towards you from out of the ruins the renegade leaps into the car beside you cackling like a maniac as he lunges for your throat with his flick knife. The engine growls responsively but its powerful roar is all but drowned by a sudden eruption of gunfire from the 3 gang members you just ran into. Drawning your pistol taking aim at the 3 aproching members you start to fire back.

An eerie silence is broken by Long Jake who shouts out    it aint over yet. 'Don't let 'em circle you.'  You sense someone or something moving among the ruined shops away to your right. They are trying to get into a position where they will have a clear shot at you. You dash for the shop shooting you gun while you run but Your enemy's reactions are lightning fast. He throws himself down behind the a rock and your gunfire stike it. You make it inside but An instant later the unexpected sound of running feet makes you spin on your heel. The punk is charging at you from the ruins with a knife held in his hand. You raise your weapon but before you can squeeze the trigger he dives full length and catches you in the chest with the crown of his head. His attack slams you backwards to the ground and gasping for breath you struggle to grab hold of his wrist before he can make use of his deadly blade.

You run out the store heading back to your car but are once again shot at. You throw yourself down your hand reaching automatically for a weapon even as you hit the ground. Then you roll over and over towards your car and take cover behind the engine compartment. With the blood on your face from the last punk reducing your vision you force yourself to listen for a sound that will betray the whereabouts of your hidden attacker.  'He's in the drugstore!' shouts Long Jake his voice drawing another burst of fire from a building directly opposite.
If you have a machine gun and wish to use run back into the store to use it'turn to North
If you do not'turn to East,  You are shot by the guy in the drug store and fall down and die.

The instant you set foot in the store two hands reach out of the darkness grab you by the jacket its jake. Immediately there is a long burst of fire and a hail of bullets scythes the air where you were standing only moments before.  'These ain't no ordinary punks' growls Long Jake peering cautiously over the edge of the bullet-shattered window frame. They're a mite anxious to get their hands on her too' he says nodding towards the girl who is crouching behind the store counter her eyes wide with fright.  'What do they want with her?' you ask but before Long Jake can reply there is a flash and a deafening explosion. The store's rear door is blown inwards and flying debris knocks you off your feet. Stunned by the blast you rise unsteadily and reach for a weapon. A grey shape fills the rear entrance its outline fuzzy in the smoke and dust that hover there. Then the shape draws into focus and you see the silhouette of a tall man.  'Look out!' screams Long Jake as the figure leaps through the doorway a shotgun held before him ready to fire.
